channel.title: What does this DALsys machine in Questionable Ethics do?
channel.description: ![](upload://cnInc4FQLgFjTbtANHhPxn1DRET.png) Checked the wikis, ARG stuff, google searched, but I can't find anything about this specific machine in Questionable Ethics (it's in the headcrab/bullsquid room after the alien grunt chamber). It is interactable; pressing E on it makes a sound like entering a code failed, but I can't seem to press anything on the keypad/shoot the buttons or do anything else with it.

item.title: What does this DALsys machine in Questionable Ethics do?
item.dc:creator: Viewer
item.description:
It’ll probably be one of the steps needed to uncover the Gonarch hidden in the labs, once they implement it. OOPS

Edit: turns out I was all wrong and a bag of chips, sorry.

Read full topic
item.source: What does this DALsys machine in Questionable Ethics do?

item.title: What does this DALsys machine in Questionable Ethics do?
item.dc:creator: grintch
item.description:
1200×675 718 KB

Checked the wikis, ARG stuff, google searched, but I can’t find anything about this specific machine in Questionable Ethics (it’s in the headcrab/bullsquid room after the alien grunt chamber). It is interactable; pressing E on it makes a sound like entering a code failed, but I can’t seem to press anything on the keypad/shoot the buttons or do anything else with it.
